name: United Critics Website
description: I made this website for a Sweden-based Game Reviewing company called United Critics. The website is made through Wix. I have made everything end-to-end using the Wix Website Editor along with their Dev Velo Mode. It was purely based on the theme they asked for along with a blog-like feature where they can post their reviews.

name: Portfolio Website
description: This is literally this website. I made this website using React with Gatsby. Everything has been made from scratch. I had to learn a lot of things to make this website including React, Gatsby, GraphQL, CSS, and a lot of other things. I have always wanted to make my own website for my portfolio instead of using a website builder so that I can have the flexibility I want. I hosted this website using AWS S3 along with AWS Cloudfront.
